SELECT tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd AS com_mst_cd , tm_code_dtl.com_dtl_cd AS com_dtl_cd
, tm_code_dtl.com_dtl_name AS com_dtl_name , tm_code_dtl.com_val01 AS com_val01 , tm_code_dtl.com_val02 AS com_val02 , tm_code_dtl.com_val03 AS com_val03
FROM tm_code_mast INNER JOIN tm_code_dtl
ON tm_code_mast.com_mst_cd = tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd
WHERE tm_code_mast.use_yn = '1' AND tm_code_dtl.use_yn = '1' AND tm_code_mast.com_mst_cd = #{com_mst_cd} ORDER BY tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd , tm_code_dtl.com_dtl_cd

SELECT tm_jisu_mast.jisu_seq AS jisu_seq
, tm_jisu_mast.jisu_id AS jisu_id , tm_jisu_mast.jisu_kor_nm AS jisu_kor_nm , tm_jisu_mast.jisu_eng_nm AS jisu_eng_nm , tm_jisu_mast.jisu_summary AS jisu_summary , tm_jisu_mast.base_jisu AS base_jisu , tm_jisu_mast.base_date AS base_date , tm_jisu_mast.method_file_id AS method_file_id , tm_jisu_mast.jisu_file_id AS jisu_file_id , tm_jisu_mast.req_content AS req_content , tm_jisu_mast.status AS status
, tm_code_dtl.com_dtl_name AS status_nm , tm_code_dtl.com_val01 AS status_position
, tm_jisu_mast.jisu_id AS prev_jisu_id , tm_jisu_mast.method_file_id AS prev_method_file_id , tm_jisu_mast.jisu_file_id AS prev_jisu_file_id
FROM tm_jisu_mast INNER JOIN tm_code_dtl
ON tm_jisu_mast.status = tm_code_dtl.com_dtl_cd
WHERE 1 = 1
AND tm_code_dtl.use_yn = '1' AND tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd = 'COM001'
AND tm_jisu_mast.reg_id = #{user_id}
